metadata.title: CVE-2019-9823 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In several JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA versions, creating remote runconfigurations of JavaEE application servers leads to saving a cleartextrecord of the server credentials in the IDE configuration files. The issuehas been fixed in the following versions: 2018.3.5, 2018.2.8, 2018.1.8.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
